entry.title: [SBG3][Cooling System] - Rack S311B01
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 30, 07:00 - 19:00 UTC

Jan 13, 15:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 30/01/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 30/01/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours.

The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [MRS/SGP][Network] - Backbone incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 16, 01:44 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Backbone infrastructure has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 15/01/2025 21:42 UTC
End time : 16/01/2025 00:12 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a maintenance on our operator's side.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Jan 16, 00:24 UTC
Monitoring - No more latency observed on our backbone between Marseille and Singapore.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Jan 15, 23:40 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Backbone infrastructure.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 15/01/2025 21:42 UTC
Customers Impact : Latency is being observed on our backbone between Marseille and Singapore.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a maintenance on our operator's side.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
